author: TMZ Staff
title: Video of Alleged Crypto Torture 'Victim' Tied Up, Cooking Crack 5 Days After Capture
description: The Italian businessman who was allegedly kidnapped and tortured in NYC for nearly 3 weeks, wasn't always in distress during that period ... according to a bizarre video of him cooking crack in an air fryer. TMZ obtained a 20-second clip, which…
